Body:
expression = re.compile(rfc._COOKIE_VALUE_REGEX)
bad_examples = ['a bad cookie value', '"a-"bad"-cookie-value"',
    'a-cookie-value,bad', '"a-cookie;bad-value"', 'cookie-value:\tbad',
    'is-that-a-backslash?\\yep']
for bad_example in bad_examples:
    self.assertFalse(bool(expression.fullmatch(bad_example)), msg=
        "Bad cookie value '{v}' was not rejected by regex".format(v=
        bad_example))
